莊.definition: farmstead; village; manor; place of business; banker (in a gambling game); grave or solemn; holdings of a landlord (in imperial China)

莊周.definition: same as Zhuangzi 莊子|庄子[Zhuang1 zi3] (369-286 BC), Daoist author

莊周夢蝶.definition: Zhuangzi 莊子|庄子[Zhuang1 zi3] dreams of a butterfly (or is it the butterfly dreaming of Zhuangzi?)

莊園.definition: manor; feudal land; villa and park

莊河.definition: Zhuanghe, county-level city in Dalian 大連|大连[Da4 lian2], Liaoning

莊河市.definition: Zhuanghe, county-level city in Dalian 大連|大连[Da4 lian2], Liaoning

莊浪.definition: Zhuanglang county in Pingliang 平涼|平凉[Ping2 liang2], Gansu

莊浪縣.definition: Zhuanglang county in Pingliang 平涼|平凉[Ping2 liang2], Gansu

莊稼戶兒.definition: erhua variant of 莊稼戶|庄稼户[zhuang1 jia5 hu4]

莊老.definition: Zhuangzi and Laozi, the Daoist masters
